QuestData.Title: At the Stonemother's Call
QuestData.Description: It is time. The Stonemother will speak with you. You can find her throne in northern Deepholm, above the Scoured Reach.
QuestData.RewardText: So you've come.$B$BFleshlings just like you killed my daughter... my only daughter. With no provocation.$B$BNot sated at stripping me of my family, more of you flocked to Deathwing to serve him in ravaging my home.$B$BYou're quite arrogant to come before me asking for MY help. I'm tempted to crush you where you stand.
